I

IAnswer - interface net.codemusic.smartears.IAnswer.
This interface represents an answer that can be played and which the user must identify or otherwise answer
IAnswerManager - interface net.codemusic.smartears.IAnswerManager.
This interface is responsible for managing a user-alterable set of answers.
IAnswerSelectionStrategy - interface net.codemusic.smartears.IAnswerSelectionStrategy.
This interface represents a class that is a particular way of choosing the next answer from a set of possible answers.
IController - interface net.codemusic.smartears.IController.
This is the interface that is used to provide access to the main objects in the system and to connect the GUI classes to the classes that model the sysetm.

IExcercise - interface net.codemusic.smartears.IExcercise.
This interface represents a collection of IAnswers that constitute a set of related structures to be learned together
